Html:
Hi All,
I am quite new to UI Automation and UI Verify tool.
I am mostly using UI Verify to lookup property values in my custom application.
So far all controls can be recognized and give me some useful information but when I try to recognize Label control (standard, basic label) UI Verify cannot recognize it on the form.
Has anybody else experience similar behavior? and if so is there any fix for this?
Much appreciated for all the help.
Regards
Kris
